description.value:
Allows making untrained Psyniscience and Navigation (Warp) Tests to navigate the warp as if a Navigator, even if the user is not one. Must make +0 Willpower Test or gain 1d5 Insanity. Gain no benefit if already possessing these skills.

Requirements

Disliked by the Navis Nobilite. Used aboard a warp-capable void ship.

Effect: Extremely Rare

Notes: -
